metadata.title: CVE-2022-0813 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: PhpMyAdmin 5.1.1 and before allows an attacker to retrieve potentiallysensitive information by creating invalid requests. This affects the langparameter, the pma_parameter, and the cookie section.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
